lead_paragraph: Bank of Nova Scotia's two recent acquisitions suggest that the bank, Canada's third largest, is starting to make good on its pledge to find strategic growth opportunities, and more deals are likely to follow soon, Reuters reports.
snippet: Two recent acquisitions by Bank of Nova Scotia suggest Canada's No. 3 bank is starting to make good on its pledge to find strategic growth opportunities, and more deals are likely to follow soon.

headline.main: More Deals to Come for Scotiabank

abstract: Two recent acquisitions by Bank of Nova Scotia suggest Canada's No. 3 bank is starting to make good on its pledge to find strategic growth opportunities, and more deals are likely to follow soon.
